entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
